name: Orbits (the_nope_slope, AustereTriceratops, cousday, powercactus)
description:
Controls:  

space: toggle pause

mouse scroll-wheel: zoom in/out

left-click on planet: make origin

left-click-drag: pan view

right-click: set boost direction (the ship accelerates away from the displayed line)

escape: cancel boost

hold shift: fast forward time

------------------------------------------------

Travel the stars! Visit exotic moons! Skirt a black hole! Chat with aliens! Explore the universe freely with unlimited fuel!

Deliver things.

------------------------------------------------

Hard Mode:

Orbit all planets but:

+ Only boost while time is playing

+ Only click on Lux and never any other planets/suns  (only have Lux as your reference frame)

+ Never crash
